segments.text: Thank you for your interest in this job . You'll be hearing from us . Send the next applicant in on your way out , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much for offering me this opportunity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has been pleasant talking with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have enjoyed talking with you too . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I call you at your home about our final decision ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . My telephone number is 367 - 1314 . You can call me between four and six in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll get in touch with you by next Wednesday . Thank you for your interest in this job .
segments.speaker: S1
